# isQuotationMark

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the scalar is one that is used in writing to surround quoted text.

## Declaration

```swift
var isQuotationMark: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property corresponds to the “Quotation_Mark” property in the [http://www.unicode.org/versions/latest/].
title: isQuotationMark
